Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponse] object to specify the results from trying to update the user’s affinity for a media item. After performing the add action using the criteria specified in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpdateMediaAffinityIntent] object, create an instance of this class with the results of the action. # INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponse

**Class**

An intents handler’s response to an update media affinity intent.

## Declaration

```swift
class INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponse
```

## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponse] object to specify the results from trying to update the user’s affinity for a media item. After performing the add action using the criteria specified in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpdateMediaAffinityIntent] object, create an instance of this class with the results of the action. Siri communicates the response status to the user at appropriate times.

You create an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponse] object in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentHandling/confirm(intent:completion:)] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentHandling/handle(intent:completion:)] methods of your add media handler object. For more information about implementing your handler object, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentHandling].

## Initializing the Response Object

- **init(code:userActivity:)**: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

## Providing the Response Code

- **code**: The code that indicates whether the app successfully updated the user’s affinity for the media.
- **INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponseCode**: Codes returned by an intents handler in response to an update media affinity request.

## Update Media Affinity

- **INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentHandling**: The interface that handles requests to update the user’s preference for a media item.
- **INUpdateMediaAffinityIntent**: A request to update the user’s affinity for a media item.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResponse

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
